message.content:
<<<api>>>: PrintWriter.write
<<<code>>>: try { 
    out.print("[");
    boolean first = true;
    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
        if (first) {
            first = false;
        } else {
            out.print(",");
        }
        String usuari = (String) iterator.next();
        out.print("\"" + usuari + "\"");
    }
    out.print("]");
} catch (Exception e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
}
<<<explanation>>>: The autocomplete widget expects the response from the server to be in a specific format, which is an array of strings. You need to modify your code in the Controller to output the response in this format. You can use PrintWriter's write method to write the response as a JSON array.
